description: ComputeHub pipeline diagram, VAPI eval UX consolidation, thematic coding scope fix, transcription participant filter.

changes.description: Researchers now see all pipeline steps (transcription, thematic coding, VAPI evaluation, etc.) as visual nodes with status lights in a dedicated pipeline diagram on the ComputeHub page. Implemented by extracting VAPI eval queue controls from UnifiedParticipantsTable and adding PipelineNode/pipeline diagram components to ComputeHub.tsx.

Thematic coding Pass B (feedback â†’ experiment_responses) now correctly runs on any call that has an experiment_response, not just transcribed calls. Implemented by building a union candidate set of transcribed call IDs and all response call IDs, with Pass A gated on transcription and Pass B gated on response presence.

AssemblyAI transcription trigger no longer queues researcher test calls (IDs starting with 'researcher-'), focusing only on real participant calls with 24-character Prolific IDs. Implemented by adding a prolific_id length filter before building the candidate call_id set.
